entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023
